__e: And yet I vividly remember telling you that you needed to be honest with your wife about what did not happen between us.

There's very little I wouldn't do to protect my wife.
- My wife used to say, there's one way to learn to be with another person.
My wife's been gone for over a year now and I've been really lonely.
And another friend of mine lost his wife.

I was his work wife. And since work was always his life...
